playful.line: Are you a magician? Because whenever I look at you, everyone else disappears.
Do you have a name, or can I call you mine?

romantic.line: If I were to ask you out on a date, would your answer be the same as the answer to this question?
You must be made of copper and tellurium, because you're Cu-Te.

cheeky.line: Is your dad a boxer? Because you're a knockout!
Do you believe in love at first sight, or should I walk by again?

intellectual.line: Are you made of beryllium, gold, and titanium? Because you're Be-Au-Ti-ful.
My love for you is like the universe - ever-expanding and impossible to measure.

situational.line: Is your name Google? Because you have everything I'm searching for.
If beauty were time, you'd be an eternity.
